description:
Ethan`s Jolteon is useful as a sheepdog and rounds up any stray Magnemite using its electric abilities.
During an emergency where a nearby town was desperate for electricity for the Pok√©center, Jolteon was injured along with Ethan and they had to rely on Ash and Pikachu to deliver the Magnemite which were storing the electricity.
name: Thunders (Ford)
